summary: A small, evenly lit room for taking photos.
descriptionHtml:
Version 2.1 - I\'ve finally fixed the lights, so now the switches will function correctly, and so it won\'t generate a mess in the Papyrus Log or clog your game with scripts running when unneeded.

Picture Box is designed as a place for modders to show off new armors, without worrying about whether or not the lighting is flattering, or to light or dark. In addition, it includes light switches to engage and disengage the lights in two rings for those pieces that should be shown in shadow, or any mod which needs darkness for the full effect to be visible.

Adds a small door on the first pillar inside Radiant Raiment in Solitude to access the box. Alternatively you may coc 111PictureBox.

Lighting is arranged with 16 lights in an outer ring, and four lights in an inner ring. Facing the wall, the left lever controls the inner light ring. And the right lever controls the outer light ring.

Version:
1.0 - Initial version.
1.1 - Navmeshed, lights fixed. Center lights are now no fade.
2.0 - I\'ve added Spotlights in the middle of the room. You can now examine your armors under the scrutiny of lights focused directly on it. They are now controlled by the center lever. May take a couple of flips to get it on or off. I\'m not exactly sure why though.

Installation: Download with manager, activate. Or extract the ESP.

Uninstallation: Deactivate with manager, delete. Delete ESP.

Credits: Bethesda for making such an awesome game.

Me for making this mod.

Cipscis for his awesome LightSwitch script. Without it you\'d be stuck with them on.
author: Triaxx

files.name: Picture_Box_2_0
files.changelogHtml: Added Spotlights to give more even close lighting
